algorithm_technique: Iterate through the grid and check adjacent cells for the specified conditions.
problem_summary_simple: Check if cells in a grid are equal to the cell below and different from the cell to the right.
problem_summary_technical: Verify grid[i][j] == grid[i+1][j] and grid[i][j] != grid[i][j+1] for all valid cells.
key_insights: The conditions need to be checked for all adjacent cells.
Edge cases (last row and last column) must be handled implicitly by loop bounds.
The constraints on grid size (m, n <= 10) allow for a straightforward O(m*n) solution.
